ab.title: About us
ab.h1: LoonEyes Studio Company was established in 2022, operating mainly in 3 areas: drone - technology - film and game production. Currently, it is promoting the development of the Drone sector to carry out many historical, cultural and symbolic projects.
ab.h2: Pioneer in investing and applying advanced technologies of unmanned aircraft (Drone) in advertising and communication
ab.t1: Owning the largest number of devices in Vietnam
ab.t2: The most advanced technology in Drone field
